Largo.Belleair Bluffs, Florida:
Belleair Bluffs is a city in Pinellas County, Florida, United States. The population was 2,031 at the 2010 census.


== Geography ==
Belleair Bluffs is located at 27°55′10″N 82°48′59″W.
According to the United States Census Bureau, the city has a total area of 0.6 square miles (1.6 km2), of which 0.5 square miles (1.3 km2) is land and 0.2 square miles (0.52 km2) (25.40%) is water.
